original_title: Sri Lanka increases fuel quota for vehicles with effect from Tuesday (4) night
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The existing Fuel quota has been increased for the New Year festive season & will come into effect from midnight today (4).
Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekera said that as previously planned, according to the increasing need for fuel during the festive season, CPC has ordered & procured the necessary stocks.
He tweeted that Three Wheel (Special) category, that are Registered taxis have been allocated extra fuel allocations
